channel.title: Cache Problem
channel.description:
My cache installs all the correct files to the C: but then it places the cache.zip file too in the cache folder with the same files. How could I make it not put the cache.zip in there because when I uploaded it to dropbox I made sure the cache.zip was not in there. I'm thinking it has something to do with cachedownloader?? Any help appreciated - Skype joyven4
[img]http://i.imgur.com/8S33q66.png[/img]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/4hu2w1M.png[/img]
